Articles.Content: Could I please join United KerBals? My BLOC name is PenguinsMeep and my nation is: Drozd Nation

Good comrade peace b it brought to our alliance.As of now i think we should get started on protecting ourselves from the worst ,and by all means i just mean raise tech level ,an do all things you need to do.Also, I wish if your in the same allaince with another one you could see there progress to the next tech level ,and progress to chemical weapons.Not to mention I did aciddently made progress in chemical weapons (Darn site not working properly on mobile devices.)

Drozd Nation needs 700k to save itself from collapse! PLEASE donate because my stability is chaotic...

Donate quickly because next month the growth of my GDP will be 0.
sent you some funds ,and a invitation to the kerbal Union.
I'm in need of troops, there is a war going on...

Well, I lost the war, and I'm very low on troops. Then my country is in need of oil supplies and I couldn't get my spy out because I've did counterintelligence... I'll hope to withdraw my spy by next turn.

Also, welcome to UK (United Kerbals). I couldn't sent my troops because I have only 7k but I'll try sending you aid.

EDIT: For some reason my broadband link is having some troubles...

Edited December 30, 2013 by Designer225

Okay i help designer ,but as a way to prevent alliance wars we must agree on declaration of war against another nation of an alliance as while i was gone I received a commie on droz nation's actions from another member.So theres that ,and Kermany's war is due to him spying on another country so i got a commie that we should not be involved as it a conflict about spying.
Reparations were payed and apologies made, so Kermany's war ended shortly after it started.

I can't believe that for 3 days the 2wire router couldn't connect to at&t and stay long enough with both broadband and service online, missing a lot of stuff. Anyway yeah we must agree on a declaration of war against another nation of different alliance, though if it's 2/3 or 3/4 majority or complete majority (1/1 or 2/2 or 3/3 or 4/4).

Also, we should make sure espionage doesn't happen unless we agree on who we should spy on.

Now I just need to dismantle my chemical weapon program... it doesn't seem possible to do so peacefully...
yah ,and i also made progress on chem accidentally when i got an event.

Posted the dismantling onto the >BLOC forum and then someone posted that it used to exist but was removed for being useless and being exploited. Looks like we might have to keep it until the thing is re-implemented.
so far i got to the point where re affirm your a visitor or im gonna spy on you part ,and can not go any further.Though im puzzled on how it works i find that it can be useful.

Yeah, it's still very experimental... I might have to log off from Google to test this.

EDIT: Well, it's probably working. I've made this public on the web.
